text: So ce dūto taṃ bhikkhuniṃ evaṃ vadeyya atthi panāyyāya koci veyyāvaccakaro ti cīvaratthikāya bhikkhave bhikkhuniyā veyyāvaccakaro niddisitabbo ārāmiko vā upāsako vā eso kho āvuso bhikkhunīnaṃ veyyāvaccakaro ti
edit: So ce dūto taṃ bhikkhuniṃ evaṃ vadeyya atthi panāyyāya koci veyyāvaccakaro ti cīvaratthikāya bhikkhave bhikkhuniyā veyyāvaccakaro niddisitabbo ārāmiko vā upāsako vā eso kho āvuso bhikkhunīnaṃ veyyāvaccakaro ti

translations.transtext: If the messenger should say to the bhikkhunī, "Does the lady have a steward?" then, bhikkhunīs, if the bhikkhunī desires a robe, she may indicate a steward — either a monastery attendant or a lay follower — (saying,) "That, sir, is the bhikkhunīs' steward."
